summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件使用户能够使用可视月历显示来选择日期。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MonthCalendar`控件允许用户使用可视显示来选择日期。The `MonthCalendar` control allows the user to select a date using a visual display. 可以通过设置和属性来限制可选择的日期和时间 。You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 您可以通过设置、、、 、 和 属性，更改控件的日历部分的外观。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > `MonthCalendar`控件仅支持公历。The `MonthCalendar` control only supports Gregorian calendars. `MonthCalendar`控件由操作系统绘制，因此 永远不会引发事件。The `MonthCalendar` control is drawn by the operating system, so the event is never raised. 如果需要为控件提供自定义的外观 ，应重写 方法，调用的基实现， 然后执行自定义绘制。If you need to provide a customized look to the control, you should override the method, call the base implementation of , and then perform custom painting. 如果需要自定义日期格式和仅限一个日期的选择，则可以考虑使用 控件而不是 。If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a control instead of a . 使用可以 消除验证日期/时间值的很多需求。Using the eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values. 有关月历控件的详细信息，请参阅 [月历控件参考](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含 `MonthCalendar` 一个显示一个日历年份的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a `MonthCalendar` control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示如何设置 、 、、、 和 属性，以自定义日历控件的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性（如 、 和） 设置为自定义要以粗体显示的日期。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还设置 、、 和 属性以更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和 事件也会处理，并且其状态将显示在窗体上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. summary.span: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
A that represents the background color of the control.
The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不支持透明颜色，除非的 `SupportsTransparentBackColor` 值 设置为 `true` 。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 属性为环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如， 默认情况下，将与其父级相同 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅 类或 类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 从 Windows Vista 开始，根据主题，设置此属性可能不会更改日历的外观。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果将 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，则设置此属性不起作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为，日历的更新版本呈现为在运行时从当前操作系统主题派生的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，则可以禁用应用程序的视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响应用程序中其他控件的外观和行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，请打开项目设计器并取消选中 " **启用 XP 视觉样式** " 复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要在 c # 中禁用视觉样式，请打开 Program.cs 并注释掉 `Application.EnableVisualStyles();` 。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件的和设置 为默认系统颜色。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件有任何子控件，则代码会以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你 至少具有一个子控件; 但是，子容器控件（如 或 ）具有其自己的子控件 (s) 可以更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只显示一个日历年份，可以显示的最大月数为12。Only one calendar year is displayed at a time, and the maximum number of months that can be displayed is 12. 列和行的有效组合会使最大乘积为 12;对于大于12的值，将以最佳方式修改显示。Valid combinations of columns and rows make a maximum product of 12; for values greater than 12, the display is modified on a best-fit basis. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含 一个显示一个日历年份的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示如何设置 、 、、、 和 属性，以自定义日历控件的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性（如 、 和） 设置为自定义要以粗体显示的日期。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还设置 、、 和 属性以更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和 事件也会处理，并且其状态将显示在窗体上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 事件在任何日期选择期间发生，无论是通过鼠标、键盘还是代码进行。The event occurs during any date selection, whether by mouse, keyboard, or code. 此 事件类似，但仅在使用鼠标进行的日期选择结束时发生。The event is similar, but it occurs only at the end of a date selection made using the mouse. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，并设置其 和 属性，并将分配 给 控件的属性 。The following code example creates a , sets its and properties, and assigns the to the property of the control. 引发事件时， 和 属性值将显示在文本框中。When the event is raised, the and property values are displayed in the text boxes. 此示例要求具有一个 具有两个 控件、一个 和一个控件的 。This example requires that you have a with two controls, a , and a control. span.span: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
The foreground of the control.
The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是一个控件属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如， 默认情况下，将与其父级相同 。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅 类或 类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 从 Windows Vista 开始，根据主题，设置此属性可能不会更改日历的外观。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果将 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，则设置此属性不起作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为，日历的更新版本呈现为在运行时从当前操作系统主题派生的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，则可以禁用应用程序的视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响应用程序中其他控件的外观和行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，请打开项目设计器并取消选中 " **启用 XP 视觉样式** " 复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要在 c # 中禁用视觉样式，请打开 Program.cs 并注释掉 `Application.EnableVisualStyles();` 。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件的和设置 为默认系统颜色。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件有任何子控件，则代码会以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你 至少具有一个子控件; 但是，子容器控件（如 或 ）具有其自己的子控件 (s) 可以更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性在功能上等效于使用 方法。Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the method. 可以通过设置或属性分别设置开始日期和结束日期 。You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the or properties. 不能通过设置 属性的或属性值来更改开始日期和结束日期 。You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the or property values of the property. 应使用 、 或 。You should use , , or . 如果 的属性值 大于其 属性值，则将交换日期; 属性值将成为开始日期， 属性值将变为结束日期。If the property value of the is greater than its property value, the dates are swapped; the property value becomes the starting date, and property value becomes the end date. > [!NOTE] > 如果选择范围时，滚动浏览日历会显示导航按钮 (例如，不会保留日期范围) 。Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved). 如果你有一个月份显示，范围为04/01/2001 到04/10/2001，则将日历滚动到三月份会按如下所示更改所选范围：03/01/2001 到03/10/2001。If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001. 如果显示了多个月（例如3月和4月），并且所选范围为04/01/2001 到04/10/2001，则将日历滚动回1月和2月时，将更改所选范围，如下所示：01/01/2001 到01/10/2001。If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001. > [!NOTE] > 为 启用了视觉样式的控件设置，将导致选择范围无法在控件上正确绘制。Setting the for a control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 周日期文本的字体颜色取决于 属性。The font color of the days-of-the-week text depends on the property. 如果将设置为 日历的主显示区的等于，则 会导致星期几文本变为不可读。Setting the equal to the for the main display area of the calendar causes the days-of-the-week text to become unreadable. 从 Windows Vista 开始，根据主题，设置此属性可能不会更改日历的外观。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果将 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，则设置此属性不起作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为，日历的更新版本呈现为在运行时从当前操作系统主题派生的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，则可以禁用应用程序的视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响应用程序中其他控件的外观和行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，请打开项目设计器并取消选中 " **启用 XP 视觉样式** " 复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要在 c # 中禁用视觉样式，请打开 Program.cs 并注释掉 `Application.EnableVisualStyles();` 。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含 一个显示一个日历年份的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示如何设置 、 、、、 和 属性，以自定义日历控件的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性（如 、 和） 设置为自定义要以粗体显示的日期。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还设置 、、 和 属性以更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和 事件也会处理，并且其状态将显示在窗体上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
